column1: Mortgage Originations Estimates as estimated by the MBA's forecast model and subject to revisions. Historical data are benchmarked to annual HMDA data, adjusted for market coverage.
The information and data are provided “as is” with no warranties of any kind. Use of the data is at the user’s sole risk.
